Player History
Was selected to the 1965 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/19/1967 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/2/1968 to a 3-year deal worth $10,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1969, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/11/1971 to a 2-year deal worth $1,951,001 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/3/1973 to a 1-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
